      • stateHelper

        public static boolean stateHelper(Kartoffelmarktspiel kms,
                                  java.lang.String requestedState)
                           throws InvalidStateChangeException
        Responsible for state setting. Returns true if state setting done or not necessary. Returns false if requested changing of state requires deletion of Data. Throws Exception if State-changing is invalid or if State is undefined.
        Throws:
        InvalidStateChangeException

      • getMinMax

        public static int[] getMinMax(java.util.Set<Contract> contracts,
                              java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Amount> sDistribution,
                              java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,Amount> bDistribution)
        gets the minimum and maximum values of the distributions and compares it to the min and max of the contracts set. With these values we can limit the chart on 20% difference to the highest and lowest possible value, if a contract price is much to high or much to low .
